children.value: apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends --yes g++ gfortran libblas-dev libcairo2-dev libgmp-dev libgmp10 libgmp3-dev libgsl0-dev libjpeg62 liblapack-dev libncurses5-dev libreadline-dev libx11-dev libxt-dev make r-base r-base-core r-base-dev r-cran-amelia r-cran-ggplot2 r-cran-mvtnorm r-cran-plyr r-cran-reshape2 r-cran-zoo texlive-fonts-extra texlive-latex-base zlib1g-dev && apt-get clean autoclean && apt-get autoremove --yes
